name: ds
description: Design System monorepo with automated CI/CD

scripts.release: cd packages/utopia && npm run build && cd ../.. && NPM_CONFIG_YES=true changeset publish
scripts.ci:build: npm run build:tokens && npm run build
scripts.ci:test: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.setup:hooks: husky install && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npm run precommit"
scripts.lint:all: cd apps/utopia-website && npm run lint && cd ../../packages/utopia && npm run lint
scripts.validate:all: cd apps/utopia-website && npm run validate:design-system && npm run type-check

author: Club Employes
